Education/Qualification (Essential):Post Graduate Training Qualification in Genetic Counseling
Board Eligible or Board Certified by relevant overseeing institution e.g. The American Board of Genetic Counseling (ABGC), The American Board of Medical Genetics and Genomics (ABMGG), or The Canadian Association for Genetic Counsellors (CCGC).Education/Qualification (Preferred):Minimum 2 years experience
Board Certified by relevant overseeing institution - e.g. (ABGC, ABMGG, CCGC)Education/Qualification (Essential):Post Graduate Training qualification in Genetic Counseling
Board Eligible or Board Certified by relevant overseeing institution e.g. The American Board of Genetic Counseling (ABGC), The American Board of Medical Genetics and Genomics (ABMGG), or The Canadian Association for Genetic Counsellors (CCGC).Experience:Minimum two (2) years clinical experience in a Pediatric Hospital dealing with complex care patientsJob Details
